title: JavaintKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about JavaintKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
int myNum = 100000;
System.out.println(myNum);

Definition and Usage
The
int
keyword is a data type that can store whole numbers from -2147483648 to 2147483647.
Related Pages
Read more about data types in our
Java Data Types Tutorial
.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers JavaintKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavaintKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of JavaintKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
